name: EnOceanSpy
tagline: Use your Raspberry Pi to log all incoming telegrams with an USB300 stick
body:
EnOceanSpy
==========

Use your Raspberry Pi to log all incoming telegrams with an USB300 stick.

Requirements (hardware):
Raspberry Pi
EnOcean USB300

Have fun to analyze your environment for EnOcean devices.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
